author: luehe
msg: Moved check for JSP resource existence into synchronized block (if JspServletWrapper==null), to avoid having multiple threads check for it simultaneously

author: markt
msg: - Fix bug 19238. Don't wrap a ServletException in a JasperException.
A custom exception in a JSP will be be wrapped in a ServletException.
If this is further wrapped in a JasperException Tomcat can't get at the
original exception and error page mappings in web.xml are not applied.

author: luehe
msg: Fixed Bugzilla 28361 ("foreach no longer works in tag file")

author: markt
msg: - Fix bug19049. Clarify error message when nesting exceptions.
